title: Meet Dr. Veena Verma-Dzik
description: Meet Dr. Veena Verma-Dzik, our highly experienced naturopathic physician at NY Center For Integrative Health located in Manhattan. Call on (866) 320-6402
cleaned_text: Meet Dr. Veena Verma-Dzik Dr. Veena Verma-Dzik, ND, FIAMA, is a Naturopathic Physician and certified medical acupuncturist. She is highly experienced in treating acute and chronic health conditions. She received her doctorate from the University of Bridgeport College of Naturopathic Medicine. She also received further training and certification in Facial Rejuvenation Acupuncture, MTHFR, Lyme Disease, and tick-borne illnesses. She furthers her education through organizations including ILADS (The International Lyme and Associated Diseases Society), the Association for the Advancement of Restorative Medicine, Integrative Medicine for Mental Health, and many more. Each patient she sees receives personalized, individual care involving research-based treatments and therapies from her own clinical experience and success. Her specialties include: - Lyme and tick-borne Illnesses - Mold and Environmental Toxicity - Women's health - Pediatrics - ADD/ADHD - GI conditions - Mood/Hormonal Imbalances - Allergies and Food Sensitivities Therapies she prescribes include herbal medicine, nutritional therapeutics, homeopathic medicine, low-dose immunotherapy, and acupuncture. When it comes to diagnosing, Dr. Verma uses in-depth functional laboratory testing and analysis and truly practices the art of medicine. She takes the time to listen to her patients. With a focus on helping her patients achieve physical and mental health to prevent illness, Dr. Verma's success lies not just in identifying and treating the physiological cause of each individual's condition but also in educating them on how to make effective lifestyle changes and providing the insight and support each person needs. Capable of integrating her therapies with a conventional medical treatment plan, Dr. Verma's extensive experience allows her to bridge the gaps between these two approaches. Dr. Verma is a nature, health, and fitness lover. Along with her physical, mental, and spiritual health, quality time with her two children, husband, and animals is important to her. Dr. Verma can be consulted in person at Connecticut Center For Integrative Medicine as she only does Virtual consultations at NY Center for Integrative Health at present.
